title: Please HELP
content:
Hello talented people. I need to order a sign for this catering company. The web designer is out of town and I have no idea what this font is. Can anyone give me a clue, anything pretty close would work.

[http://www.seasonsofthymecatering.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024256/http:/www.seasonsofthymecatering.com/ "http://www.seasonsofthymecatering.com/")

Thanks tons,  
Ann

 [‹ 007 Quantum of Solice Trailer - Font Used on Computer Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49830 "Go to previous forum topic") ['heard' - serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49728 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Annmorford
